title: Graph of birth rates - cause and effect

content.question: Using the graph, answer (a), (b), and (c). (a) Briefly describe how ONE specific historical event or development contributed to the high birth rates in the United States from 1946 to 1964. (b) Briefly describe ONE specific historical effect of the high birth rates on United States society from 1946 to 1964. (c) Briefly explain ONE specific historical change in United States society from 1965 to 1980 that resulted from the trend in birth rates from 1946 to 1964.

frqParts.text: Using the graph, answer (a), (b), and (c). (a) Briefly describe how ONE specific historical event or development contributed to the high birth rates in the United States from 1946 to 1964. (b) Briefly describe ONE specific historical effect of the high birth rates on United States society from 1946 to 1964. (c) Briefly explain ONE specific historical change in United States society from 1965 to 1980 that resulted from the trend in birth rates from 1946 to 1964.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
